data.shortDescription: The next evolution of community-run sports betting
data.aboutTitle: SportX - The next evolution of community-run sports betting
data.aboutText: Driven by a vision of user control, SportX is committed to becoming the worldâ€™s first community-run sports betting platform. By turning users into stakeholders, SportX solves the users/owner dilemma that plagues traditional betting sites. Instead, SportX is about community-led growth, control, and development. The SX token (SX) will serve this purpose by aligning stakeholders and enabling decentralized governance that will guide SportX to a sustainable future. SX is an ERC-20 token that will exist simultaneously on the Ethereum and Matic networks. 2,000 lucky winners will share 40,000 SX tokens! Zyro increases the efficiency and lowers the fees of trading by using a much high-performance underlying public chain-zilliqa. It made frictionless, high-frequency trading possible.
